experiences: Developed a bilingual (English-Spanish) educational science app for Android and iOS, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver interactive lessons, quizzes, and games with real-time progress tracking, boosting engagement and retention.

Engineered a scalable backend (Node.js, MongoDB) and integrated Firebase for real-time sync, ensuring a seamless user experience. Built cross-browser UI/UX (Flutter, Figma, JavaScript), boosting engagement by 35%.

Achieved 92% test coverage with Jest for 15+ features. Led Agile sprints, optimizing features and workflows, improving team productivity by 27%. Integrated text-to-speech Spanish voiceovers for accessibility and multilingual learning.

Built and enhanced backend RESTful APIs using Java, Spring Boot, and Hibernate for a customer support automation system that processed live telecom queries. Implemented logic for ticketing and escalations, improving response time by 48%.

Designed and integrated data storage solutions with MySQL for structured transactional data and Apache Cassandra for handling high-volume unstructured logs, ensuring high availability and fault tolerance.
Containerized the application with Docker and deployed it to AWS EC2, utilizing S3 for storage and CloudWatch for monitoring, enabling seamless CI/CD and reducing infrastructure maintenance time.
